56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Ali:I never saw the Prophet (ﷺ) saying, "Let my parents sacrifice their lives for you," to any man after Sa`d. I heard him saying (to him), "Throw (the arrows)! Let my parents sacrifice their lives for you

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمِجَنِّ وَمَنْ يَتَتَرَّسُ بِتُرْسِ صَاحِبِهِ
chapter.eng-name: The shield, and shielding oneself with the shield of his companion
